text.value:
INSERT INTO ch_fss.watermark_table (process_name, last_processed_date,created_by,created_date, updated_date, updated_by)
VALUES (
    'TransactionProcessing',
    TO_TIMESTAMP('@{variables('LatestProcessedEndDate')}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') + INTERVAL '1 day',
    'Admin',
    NOW(),
    NOW(),
    'Admin'
);

source.query:
WITH params AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('month', last_processed_date)::date AS start_date,
    date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE)::date AS current_month_start,
    CURRENT_DATE AS today
  FROM ch_fss.watermark_table
  WHERE process_name = 'TransactionProcessing'
  order by created_date desc
  LIMIT 1
)
SELECT
  generate_series::date AS start_date,
  LEAST(
    (generate_series::date + INTERVAL '1 month')::date,
    today
  ) AS end_date
FROM params,
LATERAL generate_series(
  start_date,
  current_month_start,
  interval '1 month'
)
ORDER BY start_date;

scriptLines: locate(' - ', Comments) - (locate('Added by: ', Comments) + length('Added by: '))
locate('***', Comments, locate('***', Comments) + 1) - (locate('On: ', Comments) + length('On: '))
story_date = toString(toTimestamp(story_date, 'MM/dd/yyyy hh:mm:ss a'), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS')) ~> derivedColumn3

insert into ch-fss.job_run_status
(pl_name, pl_runid, pl_triggertime, pl_triggertype, End_time, Start_time,status,error_message)
values (
  '@{pipeline().Pipeline}',
  '@{pipeline().RunId}',
  '@{formatDateTime(pipeline().TriggerTime, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')}',
  '@{pipeline().TriggerType}',
  '@{variables('end_time')}',
  '@{variables('start_time')}',
  '@{variables('status')}',
  '@{variables('error_message')}'
)

scripts.text:
UPDATE ch_fss."transaction" t
SET transaction_type_code_id = CASE
    WHEN t.transaction_amount < 0 AND t.payment_method = 'F' THEN 3
    WHEN t.transaction_amount < 0 THEN 2
    WHEN t.transaction_amount > 0 THEN 1
    ELSE transaction_type_code_id  -- keep existing if none match
END;
